Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-4, affected by CVE-2024-11053
